Uses of Class
org.nmdp.ngs.feature.Allele

  • Packages that use Allele 
    Package Description
    org.nmdp.ngs.feature
    Features.

    • Uses of Allele in org.nmdp.ngs.feature

      Methods in org.nmdp.ngs.feature that return Allele 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Allele Allele.Builder.build() 
      Allele Allele.doubleCrossover(Allele right)
      A method to simulate double crossover between Allele objects whereby the sequence from one allele is joined to the other within a specific region of overlap.
      Allele Allele.leftHardClip(String pattern)
      A method to simulate hard clipping (removal) of leftmost sequence, for example synthesized sequence representing molecular barcodes or target capture probes (primers)
      Allele Allele.merge(Allele right, long minimumOverlap)
      A method to simulate merging of two alleles strictly, meaning the sequence in the overlapping regions must be equal.
      Allele Allele.rightHardClip(String pattern)
      A method to simulate hard clipping (removal) of rightmost sequence, for example synthesized sequence representing molecular barcodes or target capture probes (primers)
      Methods in org.nmdp.ngs.feature that return types with arguments of type Allele 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Allele> VcfRecord.getAlleles() 
      Methods in org.nmdp.ngs.feature with parameters of type Allele 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Allele Allele.doubleCrossover(Allele right)
      A method to simulate double crossover between Allele objects whereby the sequence from one allele is joined to the other within a specific region of overlap.
      Allele Allele.merge(Allele right, long minimumOverlap)
      A method to simulate merging of two alleles strictly, meaning the sequence in the overlapping regions must be equal.
      Constructor parameters in org.nmdp.ngs.feature with type arguments of type Allele 
      Constructor and Description
      VcfRecord(List<Allele> alleles, List<Sample> samples)
